roleset.name: search for minerals

example.name: transitive, with arg0 and arg2
example.text: An official from China 's Petroleum and Natural Gas Corporation , when [*]being interviewed [*-1] recently by a reporter from this news agency [*T*-2] , said that China will furtheraccelerate prospecting and development natural gas resources of the Sichuan Basin [*] to increase backupreserves and output , and is preparing [*-3] to fully utilize natural gas resources , and to develop thenatural gas and chemical industry.
example.arg: natural gas resources of the Sichuan Basin

roleset.note: Framed by Neville based on ECTB. Comparison to 'search'. VN entry in search-35.2
